./.title: Introduction
./.body: 国家分类安全等级保护 Classified Security Protection 当前内容的 git-pages -> https://sanssec.github.io/protection_level_20/ 本书的目录 目录页： 使用gitbook 前置条件，需要先安装nodejs :--->https://nodejs.org Help CMD list for make make - Build the book make build - Build the book make serve - Serving the book on localhost:4000 make install - Install gitbook and plugins make epub - Build epub book make pdf - Build pdf book make mobi - Build mobi book make clean - Remove generated files 脚本工具 工具脚本 Copyright © arch.run 2020 all right reserved，powered by Gitbook Updated at 2020-05-14 15:09:10

gitbook-tool/install.html.title: 安装
gitbook-tool/install.html.body: install gitbook PS D:\Codes\markdown\esbook> gitbook -V gitbook@3.2.3 C:\Users\admin\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp-8024k85CHpZ07LJs\node_modules\gitbook ├── escape-string-regexp@1.0.5 ├── escape-html@1.0.3 ├── destroy@1.0.4 ├── ignore@3.1.2 ├── bash-color@0.0.4 ├── gitbook-plugin-livereload@0.0.1 ├── cp@0.2.0 ├── graceful-fs@4.1.4 ├── nunjucks-do@1.0.0 ├── github-slugid@1.0.1 ├── q@1.4.1 ├── spawn-cmd@0.0.2 ├── gitbook-plugin-fontsettings@2.0.0 ├── is@3.3.0 ├── open@0.0.5 ├── direction@0.1.5 ├── object-path@0.9.2 ├── extend@3.0.2 ├── json-schema-defaults@0.1.1 ├── gitbook-plugin-search@2.2.1 ├── jsonschema@1.1.0 ├── crc@3.4.0 ├── urijs@1.18.0 ├── semver@5.1.0 ├── immutable@3.8.2 ├── front-matter@2.3.0 ├── npmi@2.0.1 (semver@4.3.6) ├── resolve@1.1.7 ├── gitbook-plugin-theme-default@1.0.7 ├── moment@2.13.0 ├── npm@3.9.2 ├── error@7.0.2 (string-template@0.2.1, xtend@4.0.2) ├── tmp@0.0.28 (os-tmpdir@1.0.2) ├── dom-serializer@0.1.0 (domelementtype@1.1.3, entities@1.1.2) ├── omit-keys@0.1.0 (isobject@0.2.0, array-difference@0.0.1) ├── mkdirp@0.5.1 (minimist@0.0.8) ├── gitbook-plugin-lunr@1.2.0 (html-entities@1.2.0, lunr@0.5.12) ├── gitbook-plugin-highlight@2.0.2 (highlight.js@9.2.0) ├── gitbook-plugin-sharing@1.0.2 (lodash@3.10.1) ├── i18n-t@1.0.1 (lodash@4.17.15) ├── gitbook-markdown@1.3.2 (kramed-text-renderer@0.2.1, gitbook-html@1.3.3, kramed@0.5.6, lodash@4.17.15) ├── send@0.13.2 (etag@1.7.0, range-parser@1.0.3, fresh@0.3.0, statuses@1.2.1, ms@0.7.1, depd@1.1.2, debug@2.2.0, mime@1.3.4, http-errors@1.3.1, on-finished@2.3.0) ├── js-yaml@3.13.1 (esprima@4.0.1, argparse@1.0.10) ├── gitbook-asciidoc@1.2.2 (gitbook-html@1.3.3, lodash@4.17.15, asciidoctor.js@1.5.5-1) ├── fresh-require@1.0.3 (is-require@0.0.1, shallow-copy@0.0.1, astw@1.3.0, acorn@0.9.0, sleuth@0.1.1, through2@0.6.5, escodegen@1.14.1) ├── rmdir@1.2.0 (node.flow@1.2.3) ├── cheerio@0.20.0 (entities@1.1.2, lodash@4.17.15, htmlparser2@3.8.3, css-select@1.2.0, jsdom@7.2.2) ├── tiny-lr@0.2.1 (parseurl@1.3.3, livereload-js@2.4.0, qs@5.1.0, debug@2.2.0, faye-websocket@0.10.0, body-parser@1.14.2) ├── request@2.72.0 (tunnel-agent@0.4.3, aws-sign2@0.6.0, forever-agent@0.6.1, oauth-sign@0.8.2, caseless@0.11.0, is-typedarray@1.0.0, stringstream@0.0.6, aws4@1.9.1, isstream@0.1.2, json-stringify-safe@5.0.1, tough-cookie@2.2.2, qs@6.1.2, node-uuid@1.4.8, mime-types@2.1.27, combined-stream@1.0.8, hawk@3.1.3, bl@1.1.2, http-signature@1.1.1, form-data@1.0.1, har-validator@2.0.6) ├── cpr@1.1.1 (rimraf@2.4.5) ├── read-installed@4.0.3 (debuglog@1.0.1, util-extend@1.0.3, slide@1.1.6, readdir-scoped-modules@1.1.0, read-package-json@2.1.1) ├── juice@2.0.0 (deep-extend@0.4.2, slick@1.12.2, batch@0.5.3, cssom@0.3.1, commander@2.9.0, cross-spawn-async@2.2.5, web-resource-inliner@2.0.0) ├── chokidar@1.5.0 (async-each@1.0.3, path-is-absolute@1.0.1, inherits@2.0.4, glob-parent@2.0.0, is-binary-path@1.0.1, is-glob@2.0.1, anymatch@1.3.2, readdirp@2.2.1) └── nunjucks@2.5.2 (asap@2.0.6, yargs@3.32.0, chokidar@1.7.0) GitBook version: 3.2.3 Copyright © arch.run 2020 all right
